19:18 <vmassol> Enygma`: good evening! Do you know what's the trigger key for autocompletion? Also I'd like to move codemirror in its own module and get it through JSRX, wdyt?  
19:20 <Enygma`> Hi vmassol  
19:20 <Enygma`> was just sending you a mail  
19:21 <vmassol> ok great thanks  
19:21 <vmassol> sorry for not participating more till now, it's hard here, too many activities :)  
19:25 <Enygma`> vmassol: did not test it yet and I don`t want to make a new setup, but could you please try to install the SyntaxHighlighting app with EM?  
19:25 <Enygma`> (also the autocomplete extension)  
19:25 <vmassol> yep will do  
19:26 <vmassol> it's dinner time now but I'll try after  
19:26 <Enygma`> ok  
19:26 <vmassol> for autocomlete I need the trigger key  
19:26 <vmassol> I couldn't find it  
19:26 <Enygma`> Mac?  
19:26 <vmassol> yup  
19:27 <Enygma`>       // Mac friendly autocomplete binding  
19:27 <Enygma`> }  
19:27 <Enygma`> :)  
19:27 <vmassol> ok will try thanks, don't know why I missed that ;)  
19:27 <vmassol> gtg now, thanks  
19:27 <vmassol> has quit
